original: Eriksson, Artur Johan, civilingenjör, Borås, f. 24/6/01 i By, Kopparb. 1., av Alfred E. o. Hilma Sundström. G. 26 m. Gerda Jödahl. Barn: Barbro f. 27, Bengt 30, Bertil 35, Bo 37. — Stud. v. norra real i Sthlin, civ:ing:ex. v. KTH 24. Kemist v. A-B Joh. Ohlssons Tekn. Fabr. 17-20, chef f. Ammunitions fabr. försökslab. i Sthlm 25-28, driftsing., ’senare driftchef v. A-B Sv. Konstsilke i Borås sed. 28. Led. av Sv. tekn :fören. sed. 24.
translated: Eriksson, Artur Johan, Engineer, Borås, born June 24, 1901 in By, Kopparberg County, first child of Alfred E. and Hilma Sundström. Married in 1926 to Gerda Jödahl. Children: Barbro b. 1927, Bengt b. 1930, Bertil b. 1935, Bo b. 1937. Studied at Norra Real in Stockholm, graduated as a civil engineer from KTH in 1924. Worked as a chemist at A-B Joh. Ohlsson Tekn. Fabr. from 1917-1920, as head of the ammunition factory research laboratory in Stockholm from 1925-1928, and as a production engineer and later production manager at A-B Sv. Konstsilke in Borås since 1928. Member of the Swedish Technical Association since 1924.
